column4: is there some command line application that will change a screens resolution, I don't wanna mess with xorg.conf
you can not get into x at this time?

I switched from CRT to LCD widescreen and when I login to gnome, I see my desktop with nothing on it and no mouse response... so I figure it is because my res is set to 1600x1200 whcih is out of range
so I am using a failsafe terminal
